text: Do not deprive one another except by mutual consent for a season, so that you may devote yourselves to fastingLess than 7% of the Greek manuscripts omit “to fasting and”, to be followed by NIV, NASB, LB, TEV, etc. (It is a simple case of ‘like ending’.) and to prayer, and come together again so that Satan may not tempt you because of your lack of self-control.The whole paragraph is talking about sexual intercourse.
